Author: walkthroughthefire
Text: I’ve been having the complete opposite experience with cymbalta. I have barely any appetite and i’ve lost almost 3 lbs since last week. Weight increase/decrease is listed as a common side effect on drugs.com, so it’s possible it could be affecting your weight, but it also could be something else that’s causing it. How long have you been on it for?

Author: ziyal79
Text: I've got a friend who is on Cymbalta for fibromyalgia and she keeps mentioning she's gaining weight, and she's someone who has naturally athletic type of build . It could be that drug might have higher instances of weight gain than your previous ones. I haven't been on Cymbalta, though I have been on the others you mentioned and didn't gain weight, or lose it.  That being said, I've never found that my body wanted to co-operate with weight loss post a certain point. I'd get irresistible binge urges too.
